element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates three topographic indices, namely LS Factor, Topographic Wetness Index and Stream Power Index.

element.name: ACCFLOW
element.text: Flow accumulation layer. Units should be areal units, so the "weight" field should not be used in the "flow accumulation" algorithm

element.name: SPI
element.text: This index is related to soil erosion processes and evaluates the kinetic energy of water flows passing through each cell

element.name: TWI
element.text: This index is related to soil wetness and reflects the soil tendency to accumulate water due to its topographic position and its slope

element.name: LS
element.text: The LS factor from the popular Universal Soil Loss Equation (USLE).
